Reply with only the title and nothing else."       )     })   })    bind_task_button(chat_task, "ask_chat")    observeEvent(input$ask_chat, {     chat_task$invoke(input$user_query)   })    observe({     # Update the card title during generation and once complete     switch(       chat_task$status(),       success = story_title(chat_task$result()),       running = story_title("Generating your story..."),       error = story_title("An error occurred while generating your story.")     )   })    story_title <- reactiveVal("Your story will appear here!")   output$story_title <- renderText(story_title()) }  shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
